About.title: About Me
About.par1: I'm passionate about turning ideas into seamless digital solutions, where code, design, and innovation come together effortlessly. If I'm not coding, I'm probably at the gym, playing guitar, or watching anime.
About.par2end: to get a better sense of my work.
About.par3: Currently studying Software Engineering. I bring curiosity, precision, and a keen eye for detail, shoot me a message and let's bring your idea to life!

job1.desc: Helped 100+ engineering students grasp C++ fundamentals and mentored 15+ individually, improving class performance as a TA.

job2.desc: Built an acceptance feature in a PHP & Vue app for admins to grant certificates, improving event management for 2000+ users. Designed backend interactions using Classes & ER diagrams.
